fields.name: ace_event_number
fields.title: ACE event number
fields.description: Unique number of Trace Metal Rosette deployment during the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition

fields.name: date_time [UTC]
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: date and time of the beginning of the Trace Metal Rosette deployment in the format ISO8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: latitude [degN]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: latitude of the research vessel from which the Trace Metal Rosette deployment took place, at the beginning of the deployment [decimal degrees North]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: longitude [degE]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: longitude of the research vessel from which the Trace Metal Rosette deployment took place, at the beginning of the deployment [decimal degrees East]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: ace_sample_number
fields.title: ACE sample nunmber
fields.description: unique number of the seawater sample within the ACE project in the format shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsamplenumber

fields.name: leg_number
fields.title: Leg number
fields.description: number of the leg of the ACE expedition from which the seawater sample was taken

fields.name: project_sample_number
fields.title: Project sample number
fields.description: unique number of the seawater sample within the project that was responsible for taking the samples in the format TMR castnumber BT bottlenumber

fields.name: depth [m]
fields.title: Depth
fields.description: depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was taken [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was taken

fields.name: humic_concentration [µg SRFA eq./L]
fields.title: Concentration of humics
fields.description: concentration of humics in seawater sample [µg SRFA eq./L]
